page.title: 09SKIPPING GAMES IN DALBEATTIE
page.content:
"Teddy Bear"is a popular skipping game in our school.One person jumps in under the rope, chants the song below and does all the actions,climbing up the stairs,saying prayers and turning off the light, whilst skipping.
{Teddy Bear}
Teddy bear, Teddy bear Climb up the stairs Teddy bear, Teddy bear Say your prayers Teddy bear, Teddy bear Switch off the light Teddy bear, Teddy bear Spell good night G.O.O.D.N.I.G.H.T.
During the spelling of"Goodnight" the skipping must be done at full speed, (peppers).
